page.title: 01Summary page
page.content: The pages we have written contain our impressions of our grid.The day in the life entries tell of the day to day life styles of five members of the class. The traffic survey shows the flow of vehicles past the school gate during one day. The farm survey gives a background to the farming practice of the area. The attitudes pages sum up feelings of those who live here about their environment. The role of the school in the community and the survey of local clubs completes our survey. The amenity count shows a predominatly rural area almost all grassland with some woodland.Apart from the major land cover the amenity count is only 13 of which 8 are in Coads Green village the main population centre.
